content: Daniel Carvalho da Cunha Daniel Cunha Home Teaching Research Groups Projects Publications Students Graduate Undergraduate Courses ES344 IN1054 Other Technical Activities Miscellaneous Daniel Carvalho da Cunha Associate Professor (Professor Associado) Department of Computing Systems Centro de InformÃ¡tica (CIn) Federal University of Pernambuco (UFPE) Contact Room C-105 Tel: 55-81-21268430 (ext. 4751) Fax: 55-81-21268438 E-mail: dcunha [at] cin.ufpe.br Short Bio Daniel C. Cunha received his B.S. degree in Electronic Engineering from University of Pernambuco (UPE), Recife-PE, Brazil, in 2000 and his Master's and Doctorate degrees in Electrical Engineering from State University of Campinas (UNICAMP), Campinas-SP, Brazil, in 2003 and 2006, respectively. Dr. Cunha has worked as Associate Professor at UPE from February 2007 to February 2012. Since February 2012 he is an Associate Professor of Computer Engineering and Computer Science at the Centro de InformÃ¡tica (CIn) of the Federal University of Pernambuco (UFPE) where he is a member of the Graduate Program in Computer Science.
